name: Mirror Me
description:
This is a submission for united game jam, the theme is 2. Our take on the theme is the mirror taking the image of its counterpart. In the game you must move the limbs of your character around in 3D space with WASD and mouse scroll by selecting the balls on the tip of each limb. Important Note!!!!! make sure to play through the tutorial

skybox asset used: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/fantasy-skybox-free-18353
